    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void add()
      Try to add the location selected in the location combo box to the list of locations saved in the user object
      private void loadFlags() 
      private void loadLocations()
      Loads the list of all valid openweather locations from the locations data file
      private void remove()
      Attempt to remove the location object that is in the location list from the user's location list
      private void set()
      Tries to set the current item selected in the location list as the new current location for the user
      private void setFlagIcon(java.lang.String curCountry)
      Sets the flagIcon to the flag image of the currenty country selected in the country combobox.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocationsDialog

        public LocationsDialog(User u)
        Creates the dialog that allows the user to interact with their location list and their current location. The user can add or remove locations from their location list or change which location is their current location
        Parameters:
        u - the user object

    • Method Detail

      • set

        private void set()
        Tries to set the current item selected in the location list as the new current location for the user

      • setFlagIcon

        private void setFlagIcon(java.lang.String curCountry)
        Sets the flagIcon to the flag image of the currenty country selected in the country combobox. If the country can not be found in the list of flag images no image is loaded.
        Parameters:
        curCountry - The country flag to set the flag icon to

      • add

        private void add()
        Try to add the location selected in the location combo box to the list of locations saved in the user object

      • remove

        private void remove()
        Attempt to remove the location object that is in the location list from the user's location list

      • loadLocations

        private void loadLocations()
        Loads the list of all valid openweather locations from the locations data file
